title: List of all Android http  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android http  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: AndroidAsync
repoList.description: Asynchronous socket, http(s) (client+server) and websocket library for android. Based on nio, not threads.

repoList.name: Fast-Android-Networking
repoList.description: 🚀 A Complete Fast Android Networking Library that also supports HTTP/2 🚀

repoList.name: ffmpeg-android-java
repoList.description: Android java library for FFmpeg binary compiled using https://github.com/writingminds/ffmpeg-android

repoList.name: Android-nRF-Mesh-Library
repoList.description: Preview version of the Bluetooth Mesh Provisioner and Configurator library https://www.nordicsemi.com/

repoList.name: fuel
repoList.description: The easiest HTTP networking library for Kotlin/Android

repoList.name: Android-Multi-Bluetooth-Library
repoList.description: Android Multi Bluetooth Library http://arissa34.github.io/Android-Multi-Bluetooth-Library/

repoList.name: openalpr-android
repoList.description: Android Automatic License Plate Recognition library (http://www.openalpr.com) ported for android.

repoList.name: Volley-OkHttp-Android
repoList.description: This is a clone of Volley, with the relevant changes made to make it work with Square's OkHttp library. It also has Jackson integrated to provide a convenient object model.

repoList.name: NetBare
repoList.description: Net packets capture & injection library designed for Android

repoList.name: httpclient
repoList.description: Wrapper library around Android's HttpUrlConnection.

repoList.description: Asynchronous socket, http(s) (client+server) and websocket library for android. Based on nio, not threads.
